theorem_statement: \label{iden-3} We have \begin{description} \item{(a)} \begin{equation} \sum_{k=1}^{n}N^p_A(k)\omega(n-k)=\sum_{k=1}^{n}\tau_A(k)\left(q_{\mathbb N-A}^e(n-k)-q_{\mathbb N-A}^o(n-k)\right), \end{equation} \item{(b)} \begin{equation} \sum_{k=1}^n(-1)^{n-k}N^q_A(k)o(n-k)=\sum_{k=1}^{n}\tau_A^s(k)\left(p_{\mathbb N-A}^e(n-k)-p_{\mathbb N-A}^o(n-k)\right). \end{equation} \end{description}

sections.title: Generating Functions for $N_A^p(n)$ and $N_A^q(n)$, and Six ways to Convolution and Recurrence Identities
